issue.title: [C++] Add errno detail to filesystem-raised errors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15896](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15896). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding a conventional errno detail to filesystem-raised errors would allow the Python side to raise the proper subexception, such as `FileNotFoundError` for a non-existent path error (currently, a generic `OSError` is raised in Python).
